labels.analysis: The MCP Server primarily provides web search functionalities through Brave's API, covering various types of searches including web, images, local businesses, news, and videos. It is designed for general information gathering, research, and integration into other applications. The tools focus on retrieving up-to-date, relevant results from diverse sources, making it a versatile search utility.
labels.reasoning: The server's core functionality aligns closely with web search and research capabilities, making "Web Search & Research" the most appropriate primary label. Secondary labels such as "Content Creation" and "News & Media" are included due to the server's ability to retrieve news articles and media content, which can support content generation and news tracking. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently cover the server's functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Brave Search
server_info_crawled.author: @JonyanDunh/brave-search-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable comprehensive web search capabilities including web, image, news, video, and local points of interest searches using Brave's API. Enhance your applications with rich, up-to-date search results tailored to your queries. Access diverse search results as resources for seamless integration.

tools.name: brave_image_search
tools.description: Deploy Server Brave Search @JonyanDunh/brave-search-mcp Try in Playground brave_image_search

tools.name: brave_web_search
tools.description: Performs a web search using the Brave Search API, ideal for general queries, and online content. Use this for broad information gathering, recent events, or when you need diverse web sources. Maximum 20 results per request

tools.name: brave_local_search
tools.description: Searches for local businesses and places using Brave's Local Search API. Best for queries related to physical locations, businesses, restaurants, services, etc. Returns detailed information including: - Business names and addresses - Ratings and review counts - Phone numbers and opening hours Use this when the query implies 'near me' or mentions specific locations. Automatically falls back to web search if no local results are found.

tools.name: brave_news_search
tools.description: Searches for news articles using the Brave Search API. Use this for recent events, trending topics, or specific news stories. Returns a list of articles with titles, URLs, and descriptions. Maximum 20 results per request.

tools.name: brave_video_search
tools.description: Searches for videos using the Brave Search API. Use this for video content, tutorials, or any media-related queries. Returns a list of videos with titles, URLs, and descriptions. Maximum 20 results per request.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@JonyanDunh/brave-search-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
